name: Turf Club
preparation:
This is a distant relative to the Martini—we think. The truth is no one knows exactly where this gin cocktail originated, only that recipes for it have been swimming around for more than a century. This one calls for the sweeter, rounder old Tom gin.

Add all the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir until cold (for about 30 seconds).

Strain into a chilled coupe.

Garnish with a lemon peel.
